alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 3:32AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of White, northwestern Fulton, Pulaski, northwestern Cass, southern Starke and southwestern Marshall Counties through 415 AM EDT/315 AM CDT/... At 332 AM EDT/232 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Medaryville to near Oxford. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Winamac, Monon, North Judson, Brookston, Culver, Wolcott, Francesville, Royal Center, Medaryville, Pulaski, Ripley, Reynolds, Chalmers, Burnettsville, Monterey, Beardstown, Smithson, Denham and Hibbard. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 185 and 198. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Marshall; Pulaski; Starke; White
